item.title: Shell Script to Generate Fibonacci Series Iteratively and Recursively
item.description: By definition, the first two Fibonacci numbers are 0 and 1, and each subsequent number is the sum of the previous two. I will show you two shell script to generate Fibonacci series recursively and iteratively. Also you will get idea about the application of Fibonacci series/numbers.
